dc.title: U.S. Department of Labor -- DOL Agencies
dc.description: The U.S. Department of Labor (DOL) has a diversity of functions, we carry out our mission through a number of offices and agencies. These are organized into major program areas, and headed by an Assistant Secretary or other official.
